julia.code: """ ceil_val(x) Finds the ceiling of x as an functionInteger # Example ```julia ceil_val(1.3) # 2.0 ceil_val(2.0) # returns 2.0 ceil_val(-1.5) #returns -1.0 ``` # Reference - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Floor_and_ceiling_functions Contributed By:- [Ashwani Rathee](https://github.com/ashwani-rathee) """ ceil_val(x) = x - trunc(x) <= 0 ? trunc(x) : trunc(x) + 1 """ floor_val(x) Finds the floor of x as an Integer # Example ```julia floor_val(1.3) # 1 floor_val(2.0) # returns 2.0 floor_val(-1.7) # returns -2.0 ``` # Reference - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Floor_and_ceiling_functions Contributed By:- [Ashwani Rathee](https://github.com/ashwani-rathee) """ floor_val(x) = x - trunc(x) >= 0 ? trunc(x) : trunc(x) - 1
